item.name: Get Account Overview with valid JWT

request.description: If the user is authenticated, this operation returns the Account Overview of all banking and financial client's data

response.name: User is authenticated and Account Overview is returned

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

response.name: User is not authenticated. Client must be authenticated to access this resource

item.name: Register a new account - with valid data

request.description:
This operation registers a new unique client's Account into the system.
This automatically creates a new Payments Bank Account with a default balance

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
